config.title: Greetings Settings
config.description: Configure time-based greetings. Greetings are displayed based on the current hour. Custom greetings can override defaults for specific time ranges.

fields.label: Greetings
fields.description: Configure greetings for different times of day. Greetings are checked in order, and the first matching time range is used.

itemFields.label: Start Hour
itemFields.description: Hour of day to start showing this greeting (0-23)

itemFields.label: End Hour
itemFields.description: Hour of day to stop showing this greeting (0-23, exclusive)
